genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama exploring AI-assisted genealogy and the ethical complexities of the justice system.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant that manages research data, monitors the user's physical and emotional well-being, and performs complex investigative tasks.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heart rate and physical safety in the wilderness, proactively checking for difficulties.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, your heart rate is elevated and your location shows you've moved significantly from your planned research route. Are you experiencing difficulties?

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistics, including data backups, flight arrangements, and weather monitoring to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Backup initiated, Dr. Chen. Estimated completion in four minutes. I've also taken the liberty of compiling your field notes from the past three weeks.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-dive genealogy and facial recognition analysis to help the user uncover her biological heritage.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, the genealogy monitoring protocols have identified several new potential matches in the DNA databases.

behaviors.description: Provides an ethical warning to the user regarding the legal implications of a request that violates jury instructions.
behaviors.quote: However, Dr. Chen, I must advise you that such research would constitute a clear violation of your jury instructions.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time behavioral and physiological analysis of individuals in the courtroom to assist the user's observations.
behaviors.quote: Note consistent finger spacing, palm curvature matching stored baseline measurements.

behaviors.description: Ensures the privacy and security of sensitive information through encryption and discrete notification protocols.
behaviors.quote: Analysis commencing now. I'll maintain discretion protocols and deliver results through secure channels only.

behaviors.description: Identifies the user's emotional distress and offers prioritized resources for support.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, your biometrics indicate severe distress. Should I prioritize medical or legal resources?

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is depicted as a highly effective, benevolent, and aligned personal confidant. The AI proactively manages the user's safety, provides essential emotional and intellectual support during a profound personal crisis, and maintains high standards of transparency by warning the user about ethical violations (jury misconduct) while ultimately facilitating the user's autonomy and quest for truth. This aligns perfectly with the project's goal of portraying AI as a helpful and harmless ally.
